name: UITabBarControllerDelegate
desc: A set of methods you implement to customize the behavior of a tab bar.

items.name: func tabBarController(UITabBarController, shouldSelect: UIViewController) -> Bool
items.desc: Asks the delegate whether the specified view controller should be made active.

items.name: func tabBarController(UITabBarController, didSelect: UIViewController)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the user selected an item in the tab bar.

items.name: func tabBarController(UITabBarController, willBeginCustomizing: [UIViewController])
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the tab bar customization sheet is about to be displayed.

items.name: func tabBarController(UITabBarController, willEndCustomizing: [UIViewController], changed: Bool)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the tab bar customization sheet is about to be dismissed.

items.name: func tabBarController(UITabBarController, didEndCustomizing: [UIViewController], changed: Bool)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the tab bar customization sheet was dismissed.

items.name: func tabBarControllerSupportedInterfaceOrientations(UITabBarController) -> UIInterfaceOrientationMask
items.desc: Called to allow the delegate to provide the complete set of supported interface orientations for the tab bar controller.

items.name: func tabBarControllerPreferredInterfaceOrientationForPresentation(UITabBarController) -> UIInterfaceOrientation
items.desc: Called to allow the delegate to provide the preferred orientation for presentation of the tab bar controller.

items.name: func tabBarController(UITabBarController, animationControllerForTransitionFrom: UIViewController, to: UIViewController) -> UIViewControllerAnimatedTransitioning?
items.desc: Called to allow the delegate to return a UIViewControllerAnimatedTransitioning delegate object for use during a noninteractive tab bar view controller transition.

items.name: func tabBarController(UITabBarController, interactionControllerFor: UIViewControllerAnimatedTransitioning) -> UIViewControllerInteractiveTransitioning?
items.desc: Called to allow the delegate to return a UIViewControllerInteractiveTransitioning delegate object for use during an animated tab bar transition.
